articles.content:
Dua Lipa's concert in Toronto featured some unplanned effects, thanks to some fans who somehow snuck fireworks inside the venue, lighting them, and injuring a few fans.
The singer took the stage at … [+814 chars]

articles.description: The tectonic shifts initiated by her 2013 self-titled album are still reverberating, music journalist Danyel Smith explains.
